otherNames: Jiang Si Xiansheng, Jiāng Sī Xiānshēng, Mr. Jiang Si, Mr. Zombie, 人間社会に馴染む最強ゾンビ, 江思先生
synopsis: 1000 years ago, the protagonist became a normal zombie in the apocalypse. In order to survive the constant hunting of humans, he continued to train himself until he became immensely powerful. After 1000 years passed, he is now ready to enter human society again.
